channel.title: Process on Jeff Russell's Webstead
channel.description: Recent content in Process on Jeff Russell's Webstead

item.title: Level Up Your Process to Learn Better, Faster (Learning Overview Part 1)
item.description: Over the past few months, I’ve put some time into improving how I learn, and I’d like to share some of that in a series on “metalearning” (learning how to learn). While there are many things I want to cover, from mental models to specific tools, the underlying logic will be to look at learning as a process. Taking a process focus has several benefits - let’s walk through some of the biggest to kick off this series.
